name: CS Login
author: CleanScript

sections.description:
A plugin that allows the user to change the logo of the login screen easily from the admin panel. At the bottom of the Settings -> General page you will find a
Login Logo section with a upload button and a width textbox. You can change the login logo from there. The WordPress way.
sections.installation:
Upload the cs-login plugin to your blog, Activate it.

1, 2: You’re done!
sections.faq:
How to configure?

In General Settings, under general, at the very bottom, you have 1 upload button for the image. Once you save settings the image placed there will replace the login wp logo.
sections.changelog:
0.5

  • First Version 0.5 upload
  • Settings Upload & height Fields

0.5.1

*Removed the height textbox, it is now done automaticaly from the image size
